Project Description

 

WPF Window is an attempt to bring a nicely designed, flexible window control to the WPF open source community. It allows you to design windows in WPF applications that have a seamless look and feel across different versions of Windows.

Features

  • 3 Different themes to choose from (Blue, Black, Silver)
  • Gives you the ability to apply custom themes
  • Allows you to change the opacity of the window without affecting the windows content
  • Does not use any Win32, all managed code


Please see the documentation section for more details.
